snippet: “The Endgame,” Michael R. Gordon and Gen. Bernard E. Trainor’s book on the later stages of the Iraq war, details the surge as an exit strategy for the United States.
abstract: Gideon Rose reviews book The Endgame: The Inside Story of the Struggle for Iraq, From George W Bush to Barack Obama by Michael R Gordon and Gen Bernard E Trainor.
lead_paragraph: “The Endgame,” Michael R. Gordon and Gen. Bernard E. Trainor’s book on the later stages of the Iraq war, details the surge as an exit strategy for the United States.

headline.seo: ‘Endgame’ and Iraq, by Michael Gordon and Bernard Trainor
headline.main: Exiting the Iraq War: A Blow-by-Blow Chronicle
headline.print_headline: Exiting the Iraq War: A Blow-by-Blow Chronicle
